questions_and_notes: Note that "ground" level is interpreted as the land surface (which might be covered by snow) except when land is covered by "permanent" ice (on human time-scales), in which case "ground" is interpreted as the top of the ice (which may be  covered by snow).
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Downward Heat Flux at Snow Base
comment: Heat flux from snow into the ice or land under the snow.
